name: Random String Mission
description: Generate and return a new, short, random string of length in [5, 11).

name: Length Comparison Mission
description: Adjust state to be longer than the combined length of neighbors.

name: Shorter Comparison Mission
description: Adjust state to be a random string shorter than the length of neighbor n-1 state string.

name: Average Length Mission
description: Adjust state to have the average length of neighbors.

name: Alphabetical Order Mission
description: Find and sort alphanumerically the combined state strings of neighbors.

name: Reverse Mission
description: Find and reverse the combined state strings of neighbors.

name: Summation Mission
description: Find and sum the digits of the combined states of neighbors.

name: Only Digits Mission
description: Find and return only the digits of the combined states of neighbors (no letters).

name: Only Letters Mission
description: Find and return only the letters of the combined states of neighbors (no digits).

name: Uppercase Mission
description: Find and convert the state string of neighbor n-1 to uppercase.

name: Number of Vowels Mission
description: Return the count of vowels in the combined states of neighbors.

name: Number of Letters Mission
description: Return the count of the number of letters in the combined states of neighbors.

name: Three Most Frequent Characters Mission
description: Find and return the three most frequent characters in the combined states of neighbors.

name: Mystery String Solver Mission
description: Given a scrambled string, decode it to return the original meaningful string, if possible, or return the most likely candidates.

name: Pattern Finder Mission
description: Identify and return recurring patterns in a given string, whether in characters or subsequences.

name: Palindrome Check Mission
description: Check if a given string is a palindrome, and if not, return the closest palindrome by changing only one character.

name: Anagram Challenge Mission
description: Generate a list of possible anagrams from a given set of letters or a word and return the most relevant ones based on frequency of use.

name: Sentiment Analysis Mission
description: Analyze a given text string and classify its sentiment as positive, negative, or neutral, along with the reasons for the classification.

name: Quiz Generation Mission
description: Create a fun quiz based on provided text, generating multiple-choice questions related to the content and returning the correct answers.

name: Language Translator Mission
description: Translate a given string from one language to another using a simple dictionary-based method or predefined rules.

name: Character Frequency Mission
description: Analyze the frequency of each character in the string and return the most and least frequent characters, along with their counts.

name: Story Generator Mission
description: Create a short story using randomly chosen words from a provided list, ensuring it makes coherent sense.

name: Rhyme Finder Mission
description: Given a word, return a list of words that rhyme with it, potentially sorted by the strength of the rhyme.
